meanings.definition: A surgical procedure to lift the skin around the eyes to reduce sagging or wrinkles.
meanings.sent1: She decided to undergo an eyelift to make her eyes look younger.
meanings.sent2: The eyelift successfully removed the wrinkles around her eyes.
meanings.sent3: After the eyelift, she felt like a new person with smoother skin.
meanings.sent4: The eyelift was like a magic trick that made her look years younger.
meanings.sent5: Her confidence soared after the eyelift transformed her appearance.

meanings.definition: A cosmetic treatment to enhance the appearance of the eyes by lifting the eyelids.
meanings.sent1: The eyelift procedure made her eyes appear more vibrant.
meanings.sent2: She was thrilled with the results of her eyelift treatment.
meanings.sent3: Her friends joked that the eyelift made her look like a movie star.
meanings.sent4: The eyelift was a subtle change that made a big difference in her look.
meanings.sent5: With the eyelift, her eyes sparkled with newfound beauty.

meanings.definition: The act of physically lifting the eyelids to improve vision or appearance.
meanings.sent1: He gave his eyelids a gentle eyelift to see better.
meanings.sent2: The quick eyelift helped him see the small details clearly.
meanings.sent3: She playfully gave herself an eyelift to get a better view of the room.
meanings.sent4: The eyelift of his eyelids revealed a whole new perspective.
meanings.sent5: With a swift eyelift, his vision sharpened instantly.
